content: > **please note ** the graph for this pattern is free to view in its > entirety on my blog this ad-free > downloadable pdf enables me to be able > to bring you more free patterns in the > future go to the free graphs and assembly instructions here 1 **description ** take the cat lady title to a whole new level with this fun tapestry crochet bag that s an eye-catching ode to our furry friends this pattern is worked in 13 individually created squares in 3 unique designs that are arranged and seamed to create the body of the bag a pair of 2-color straps finish the design in a simple but fashionable manner being a cat lady will be as fun as it sounds with this exciting and customizable crochet bag this playful customizable and sturdy shoulder bag might become your favorite new project bag who doesn t need more of those and don t let the color work worry you if you can do a single_crochet you can make this design just check your gauge and keep your gauge even this pdf includes the print graph written instructions and assembly instructions images of the graphs and the written instructions for seaming are available on divinedebris com the sample in the photos was made in vanna s choice by lion brand yarn check out the kit for this pattern by lby here 2 affiliate link you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2024 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com 1 https //divinedebris com/free-cat-lady-bag-crochet-pattern-by-divine-debris/ 2 https //shrsl com/4efpy
